title: Mathematics Learning Optimization Based on the Microlearning AI-Integrated Instructional Design (MIND) Model

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental math concepts and basic digital learning tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: AI-integrated microlearning modules for beginner-level office/administrative learners in digitally supported environments

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to apply mathematical concepts by 30% through microlearning modules based on the MIND model.
Learners design personalized learning content with over 80% accuracy using generative AI (GenAI) tools.
Learners achieve a comprehensive score of at least 2.5 points (on a 5-point scale) in knowledge acquisition, understanding, and application competencies within a mixed-methods evaluation system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
